text: atah hamane usakee praarthana sveekaar kar lee aur use yaahya pradaan kiya aur usake lie usakee patnee ko svasth kar diya. nishchay hee ve nekee ke kaamon mein ek-doosare ke muqaabale mein jaldee karate the. aur hamen eepsa (chaah) aur bhay ke saath pukaarate the aur hamaare aage dabe rahate the
